Plot: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.
Title: A Mighty Wind
Actors: Jim Moret, Stuart Luce, Mary Gross, Marty Belafsky
tomatoConsensus: Though not as uproariously funny as Guest's previous movies, A Mighty Wind is also more heartfelt.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 24 nominations.
